General.Name: Sundaram Brake Linings Limited
General.Description: Sundaram Brake Linings Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of asbestos free friction materials in India and internationally. It offers brake linings, brake pads, and clutch facings. The company's products are used in commercial vehicles, passenger cars, agricultural tractors, railways, and two wheelers. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Chennai, India.

3.Name: Mr. Y.  Sathyan
3.Title: DGM of Fin., Company Sec., Compliance Officer & Nodal Officer
